name: professional-arbitrage-system
description: Professional arbitrage detection system with microservices architecture

scripts.build:deps: npm run build:types && npm run build:config && npm run build:flash-loan-aggregation && npm run build:metrics && npm run build:core && npm run build:ml
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean:cache && node scripts/clean-dist.js && npm run build
scripts.clean:cache: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const del=(d,p)=>{try{const f=fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true});f.forEach(x=>{const fp=path.join(d,x.name);if(x.isDirectory()&&x.name!=='node_modules')del(fp,p);else if(p.test(x.name)){fs.unlinkSync(fp);console.log('Deleted:',fp)}})}catch{}};del('.',/tsconfig\.tsbuildinfo$/);console.log('TypeScript cache cleared')"
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:cache && rimraf dist node_modules/.cache && npm run clean:workspaces --if-present
scripts.validate: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.dev:partition:asia: cross-env PARTITION_ID=asia-fast HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3001 ts-node -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register services/partition-asia-fast/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:partition:asia:fast: cross-env PARTITION_ID=asia-fast HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3001 tsx watch --env-file=.env services/partition-asia-fast/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:partition:l2: cross-env PARTITION_ID=l2-turbo HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3002 ts-node -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register services/partition-l2-turbo/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:partition:l2:fast: cross-env PARTITION_ID=l2-turbo HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3002 tsx watch --env-file=.env services/partition-l2-turbo/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:partition:high: cross-env PARTITION_ID=high-value HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3003 ts-node -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register services/partition-high-value/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:partition:solana: cross-env PARTITION_ID=solana-native HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3004 ts-node -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register services/partition-solana/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:partition:solana:fast: cross-env PARTITION_ID=solana-native HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3004 tsx watch --env-file=.env services/partition-solana/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:execution: cross-env HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3005 ts-node -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register services/execution-engine/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:mempool: cross-env HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3008 ts-node -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register services/mempool-detector/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:start: npm run dev:redis && npm run build && node scripts/start-local.js
scripts.dev:start:no-redis: npm run clean:cache && npm run build && node scripts/start-local.js
scripts.dev:simulate:full: cross-env SIMULATION_MODE=true EXECUTION_SIMULATION_MODE=true npm run dev:start
scripts.dev:simulate:full:memory: cross-env SIMULATION_MODE=true EXECUTION_SIMULATION_MODE=true npm run dev:start:no-redis
scripts.dev:execution:simulate: cross-env EXECUTION_SIMULATION_MODE=true HEALTH_CHECK_PORT=3005 ts-node -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register services/execution-engine/src/index.ts
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "coord,p1,p2,p3,p4,cross,exec" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,white,red" "npm run dev:coordinator:fast" "npm run dev:partition:asia:fast" "npm run dev:partition:l2:fast" "npm run dev:partition:high:fast" "npm run dev:partition:solana:fast" "npm run dev:cross-chain:fast" "npm run dev:execution:fast"
scripts.dev:minimal: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "coord,p1,exec" -c "blue,green,white" "npm run dev:coordinator:fast" "npm run dev:partition:asia:fast" "npm run dev:execution:fast"
scripts.check:circular: madge --circular --extensions ts shared/types/src shared/config/src shared/core/src shared/security/src shared/ml/src

author: Professional Arbitrage System
